title: Twitch recall sound missing
body: When I recall with Twitch, he used to say "Hmmmmm. Hahah". But when I recall now he doesn't make any sounds at all.

replies.body:
Hey GewoonYorin! 

Thanks for the report! This appears to be a known issue. Let me poke around and see what the status is and when we can get this resolved. ^-^
